a high school volleyball team as they strive to become the best in the country, overcoming their personal weaknesses and working together as a team.

Experience the dark and gruesome tale of a young man who becomes possessed by a demon, gaining immense power and fighting against an army of demonic invaders to save humanity

Explore the complex and philosophical themes of identity, morality, and power, as Devilman and his allies navigate a world filled with chaos, violence, and the looming threat of apocalypse

Enter a world where virtual reality technology has advanced to the point where players can fully immerse themselves in a massive online game world, complete with life-like graphics and sensations
Experience the excitement and danger of a fully-realized fantasy world, as players must fight their way through increasingly challenging levels in order to progress and survive

Players become trapped in a virtual reality game, where their real bodies are held captive, and must clear the game's 100 floors to escape.
In the year 2022, a new virtual reality game called Sword Art Online traps its players inside, and protagonist Kirito must fight his way through the game's levels to escape
Kirito returns to the virtual world to investigate a series of murders, and uncovers a dark plot involving a new VR game called Gun Gale Online

Edward and Alphonse Elric attempt to use alchemy to bring their deceased mother back to life, resulting in the loss of Edward's arm and leg and Alphonse's entire body, with his soul being bound to a suit of armor.
The Elric brothers set out on a journey to find the Philosopher's Stone, which they believe can restore their bodies to their original state, encountering a variety of friends and foes along the way.
Two brothers embark on a journey to uncover the dark secrets of alchemy and save their world from corruption.
After a failed attempt to revive their mother using alchemy, two brothers search for the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies.
The Elric brothers encounter a rebellion and a mysterious island while investigating a new threat to their world.

title: Berserk

Guts, the main character, is on a quest for revenge against his former friend and leader, Griffith, after a betrayal that left their mercenary group destroyed
The story explores Guts and Griffith's past as they rose through the ranks of the mercenary group, the Band of the Hawk, and the events that lead to their betrayal
After being branded with a cursed mark, Guts finds himself fighting against demonic forces while encountering new allies and enemies along the way
Guts and his group are caught in the middle of a war between human factions and demonic forces, with the fate of the world at stake
Griffith, now reborn as a powerful demon lord, creates a new empire with the Band of the Hawk as his army, leading to a final showdown with Guts
Guts and his group encounter new challenges and foes in a world forever changed by the rise of magic and demons
